title: Using Check Buttons in Matplotlib
description: This lab will demonstrate how to use check buttons in Python Matplotlib. Check buttons allow users to turn visual elements on and off with check buttons, similar to check boxes. We will use the CheckButtons function to create a plot with three different sine waves, and the ability to choose which waves are displayed with the check buttons.

meta.title: Python Matplotlib | Check Buttons Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to use check buttons in Python Matplotlib to turn visual elements on and off, perfect for interactive data visualization.
meta.keywords: Python, Matplotlib, Check Buttons, Data Visualization, Interactive Plots
